casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Louis SAUL, Defendant-Appellant. No. 374. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 5, 1939. Herman L. Falk, of New York City (Herman L. Falk and Theodore E. Gli-censtein, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. John T. Cahill, U. S. Atty., of New York City (W. Mahlon Dickerson, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
